instruction: Analyze the importance of emerging markets in the global economy beyond their representation in globally listed public equities.
output: It is crucial to understand that the significance of emerging markets goes beyond their 12% representation in global free float. These markets represent 24% of global full market cap, 39% of world GDP, and 42% of global corporate revenues as of Feb. 28, 2019. Moreover, the changing role of emerging markets in the global economy is evident from the increasing share of revenue derived by global companies from these markets over the last 15 years. Therefore, it is essential to acknowledge the transformative effects of globalization on emerging markets that further highlight their importance in the global economy.
